short_summary: Purchasing and delivering furniture to 1700 Inkster BLVD, Winnipeg, MB
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
==============================

**Product Category**
------------------

This tender announcement addresses a requirement for the following product categories under the Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C:

* Product Category 1: Interconnecting Panels and Freestanding Systems
* Product Category 2: Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/ Table Products
* Product Category 5: Ancillary and Lighting Products

**Contracting Entity**
-------------------

Library and Archives Canada (LAC) is the Contracting Entity responsible for this tender announcement.

**Tender Details**
-----------------

* Tender Reference Number: cb-464-6476978
* Amendment Number: 11
* Solicitation Number: 5Z011-24-0198
* Publication Date: 01 December 2023
* Tender Closing Date: 18 December 2023, 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 18 December 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: 17 December 2024

**Region of Operation**
-------------------

This tender opportunity is open to suppliers throughout Canada.

**Region of Delivery**
-------------------

The products purchased under this tender announcement will be delivered to 1700 Inkster Boulevard, Winnipeg, Manitoba, R2X 2T1.

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

This tender opportunity is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Notice Information**
---------------------

Contact: Isabelle Legault
Email: [receptiondesoumission-bidreceiving@bac-lac.gc.ca](mailto:receptiondesoumission-bidreceiving@bac-lac.gc.ca)
Phone: (613) 410-4428

**Attachments**
--------------

The following documents are attached to this tender announcement:

* [List the attachments]

Note: The original text's attachments are quite long and confusing, so I've left it out in the rewritten text.
